metadata.title: github.com/jaraco/zipp: Denial of Service (infinite loop) via crafted zip file in jaraco/zipp (moderate)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in jaraco/zipp. The vulnerability is triggered when processing a specially crafted zip file that leads to an infinite loop. This issue also impacts the zipfile module of CPython, as features from the third-party zipp library are later merged into CPython, and the affected code is identical in both projects.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 is installed
python3-zipp is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
